sect2.title: Dépendances
sect2.para: Perl-&perl-depversion; nécessite que les programmes suivants soient installés:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: ar, as, ld, nm diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, ln, ls, mkdir, mv, rm, touch gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp0, gcc grep: egrep, grep make: make gawk: awk sed: sed sh-utils: basename, date, echo, expr, hostname, pwd, uname, whoami textutils: cat, comm, sort, split, tr, uniq, wc
